Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-210, see notes following ยง 7-1671.01.

DC CODE ยง 7-1671.11

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: No liability shall be imposed by virtue of this chapter upon any duly authorized District officer engaged in the enforcement of any law relating to controlled substances.

The District shall not be held liable for any deleterious outcomes from the use of medical marijuana, including the acts or omissions of any qualifying patient attributed to the use of medical marijuana.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

subtitle.text: Use of Marijuana for Medical Treatment.

chapter.text: Use of Marijuana for Medical Treatment.
